content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lodestone
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 14}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 43, "index": 23}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 23, "index": 30}, {"type": "chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft lodestone, I need to place 8 chiseled_stone_bricks in a circle in the crafting grid. Therefore I will start by moving one chiseled_stone_brick from slot 45 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lodestone
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 14}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 43, "index": 23}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 23, "index": 30}, {"type": "chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 7, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to place another chiseled_stone_brick to the right of the first one. Therefore I will move another chiseled_stone_brick from slot 45 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
